verses.html:
1
Down in the valley with my Saviour I would go,
Where the flowâ€™rs are blooming
and the sweet waters flow;
Everywhere He leads me I would follow, follow on,
Walking in His footsteps till the crown be won.

verses.label: 1C
verses.html:
1
Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!
Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!
Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!
Everywhere He leads me I would follow on!

2
Down in the valley with my Saviour I would go,
Where the storms are sweeping
and the dark waters flow;
With His hand to lead me I will never, never fear,
Danger cannot fright me if my Lord is near.

verses.label: 2C
verses.html:
2
Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!
Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!
Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!
Everywhere He leads me I would follow on!

3
Down in the valley, or upon the mountain steep,
Close beside my Saviour would my soul ever keep;
He will lead me safely
in the path that He has trod,
Up to where they gather on the hills of God.

verses.label: 3C
verses.html:
3
Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!
Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!
Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!
Everywhere He leads me I would follow on!
